thread.title: BRIEF-Vermillion Announces Pricing Of $15 Mln Concurrent Public Offerings Of Stock

title: BRIEF-Vermillion Announces Pricing Of $15 Mln Concurrent Public Offerings Of Stock

organizations.name: public offerings of stock reuters staff

text:
April 13, 2018 / 1:36 PM / Updated 35 minutes ago BRIEF-Vermillion Announces Pricing Of $15 Mln Concurrent Public Offerings Of Stock Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Vermillion Inc: 
* VERMILLION, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $15 MILLION CONCURRENT PUBLIC OFFERINGS OF COMMON STOCK AND PREFERRED STOCK 
* PRICING OF PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED PUBLIC OFFERINGS OF 10 MILLION SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK AT $1.00 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
